enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Prerequisite: Students must have completed Chem 102 or 172 to register for this course.
title: WCAS BIOL_SCI 221-0-20 Cellular Processes Laboratory

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Cell Processes Laboratory. Students will design their own laboratory experiment using a defined model. Laboratory techniques and experiments in fundamental aspects of cell biology will be used.

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value: Students must have completed the prerequisites: CHEM 103 or 172 AND Bio 220

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value: All materials will be provided by instructor.

subject: BIOL_SCI
